caption:
Since dropping anchor at Woohoo HQ, Drift has been flying off the shelves faster than a seagull snatching your hot chips 😋 

🌊 Maybe it’s the refreshing salty sea breeze scent (crisp but oh-so-fresh)
💪 Maybe it’s the extra-strength, bicarb-free formula (kind to pits, tough on stink).
⛵ Or maybe it’s the extra creamy, no-tug glide (smooth sailing all the way).

Whatever the reason, this true blue beauty is *gasp* almost SOLD OUT (possibly for good!).

And we’d really hate for you to miss the boat.

Grab one before it sails away forever with our Buy 3, Get 1 FREE dealio 🎉

Offer ends midnight on March 31st 2025.
